full_summary:
**EZ899-231502 Marine Engineering Services - Standing Offer**

### Tender Details

* **Title**: Marine Engineering Services - Standing Offer, Various Locations, British Columbia and Yukon
* **Procurement Number**: WS3857441979
* **Publication Date**: February 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 30, 2025

### Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Procurement Category and Goods/Services

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Goods/Services**: Marine Engineering Services
* **UNSPSC Codes**: 81101606 - Marine engineering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Contracting Entity and Delivery Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity and Contact Information

* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Donna Fung
	+ Email: [donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites consulting firms with Marine Engineering expertise to submit offers for Standing Offers. The services required include marine engineering expertise to support a broad variety of projects in British Columbia and Yukon. The total estimated value of all Standing Offers is CAD 3,500,000 over a four-year period, with individual call-ups not exceeding CAD 750,000. PWGSC intends to authorize up to two Standing Offers for a period of two years, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods. Enquiries may be directed to Donna Fung at donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
